task_name.description: The audio task conducted for the recording.

transcription.description: Transcription of the audio file, if available.

F0semitoneFrom27.5Hz_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean fundamental frequency on semitone scale starting at 27.5 Hz.

F0semitoneFrom27.5Hz_sma3nz_meanRisingSl.description: Mean slope of rising F0 segments.

F0semitoneFrom27.5Hz_sma3nz_stddevRising.description: Standard deviation of rising F0 segment slopes.

F0semitoneFrom27.5Hz_sma3nz_meanFallingS.description: Mean slope of falling F0 segments.

F0semitoneFrom27.5Hz_sma3nz_stddevFallin.description: Standard deviation of falling F0 segment slopes.

loudness_sma3_amean.description: Mean of estimated perceived signal intensity.

loudness_sma3_meanRisingSlope.description: Mean slope of rising loudness segments.

loudness_sma3_stddevRisingSlope.description: Standard deviation of rising loudness segment slopes.

loudness_sma3_meanFallingSlope.description: Mean slope of falling loudness segments.

loudness_sma3_stddevFallingSlope.description: Standard deviation of falling loudness segment slopes.

spectralFlux_sma3_amean.description: Mean rate of spectral change between consecutive frames.

spectralFlux_sma3_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of spectral flux.

jitterLocal_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean of local jitter (cycle-to-cycle frequency variation).

jitterLocal_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of local jitter.

shimmerLocaldB_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean of local shimmer (cycle-to-cycle amplitude variation) in dB.

shimmerLocaldB_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of local shimmer.

logRelF0-H1-H2_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean ratio of first to second harmonic (H1-H2).

logRelF0-H1-H2_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of H1-H2 ratio.

logRelF0-H1-A3_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean ratio of first harmonic to third formant amplitude (H1-A3).

logRelF0-H1-A3_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of H1-A3 ratio.

F1frequency_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of first formant frequency.

F1bandwidth_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of first formant bandwidth.

F1amplitudeLogRelF0_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean of first formant amplitude relative to F0.

F1amplitudeLogRelF0_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of first formant relative amplitude.

F2frequency_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of second formant frequency.

F2bandwidth_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of second formant bandwidth.

F2amplitudeLogRelF0_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean of second formant amplitude relative to F0.

F2amplitudeLogRelF0_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of second formant relative amplitude.

F3frequency_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of third formant frequency.

F3bandwidth_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of third formant bandwidth.

F3amplitudeLogRelF0_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean of third formant amplitude relative to F0.

F3amplitudeLogRelF0_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of third formant relative amplitude.

alphaRatioV_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean alpha ratio (ratio of energy between 50-1000Hz and 1-5kHz) in voiced regions.

alphaRatioV_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of alpha ratio in voiced regions.

hammarbergIndexV_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean Hammarberg index (ratio of strongest energy peaks in 0-2kHz vs 2-5kHz) in voiced regions.

hammarbergIndexV_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of Hammarberg index in voiced regions.

slopeV0-500_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean spectral slope from 0-500Hz in voiced regions.

slopeV0-500_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of spectral slope 0-500Hz in voiced regions.

slopeV500-1500_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean spectral slope from 500-1500Hz in voiced regions.

slopeV500-1500_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of spectral slope 500-1500Hz in voiced regions.

spectralFluxV_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean spectral flux in voiced regions.

spectralFluxV_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of spectral flux in voiced regions.

mfcc1V_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean of 1st MFCC in voiced regions.

mfcc1V_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of 1st MFCC in voiced regions.

mfcc2V_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean of 2nd MFCC in voiced regions.

mfcc2V_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of 2nd MFCC in voiced regions.

mfcc3V_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean of 3rd MFCC in voiced regions.

mfcc3V_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of 3rd MFCC in voiced regions.

mfcc4V_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean of 4th MFCC in voiced regions.

mfcc4V_sma3nz_stddevNorm.description: Coefficient of variation of 4th MFCC in voiced regions.

alphaRatioUV_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean alpha ratio in unvoiced regions.

hammarbergIndexUV_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean Hammarberg index in unvoiced regions.

slopeUV0-500_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean spectral slope 0-500Hz in unvoiced regions.

slopeUV500-1500_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean spectral slope 500-1500Hz in unvoiced regions.

spectralFluxUV_sma3nz_amean.description: Mean spectral flux in unvoiced regions.

loudnessPeaksPerSec.description: Number of loudness peaks per second.

VoicedSegmentsPerSec.description: Number of voiced segments per second.

StddevVoicedSegmentLengthSec.description: Standard deviation of voiced segment length.

StddevUnvoicedSegmentLength.description: Standard deviation of unvoiced segment length.

equivalentSoundLevel_dBp.description: Equivalent continuous sound level in dB.

speaking_rate.description: Number of syllables divided by duration.

articulation_rate.description: Number of syllables divided by phonation time.

pause_rate.description: Number of pauses divided by duration.

mean_pause_duration.description: Total time pausing divided by the number of identified pauses.

std_intensity_db.description: Standard deviation of intensity in dB.

range_ratio_intensity_db.description: Intensity range, the maximum divided by the minimum, expressed as a ratio in dB.

mean_hnr_db.description: Mean Harmonic to Noise Ratio in dB.

std_hnr_db.description: Harmonic to Noise Ratio standard deviation in dB.

spectral_slope.description: Ratio of energy in a spectra between 10-1000Hz over 1000-4000Hz.

spectral_tilt.description: Linear slope of energy distribution between 100-5000Hz.

cepstral_peak_prominence_std.description: Standard deviation in Cepstral Peak Prominence.

std_f1_loc.description: Standard deviation of formant frequency 1 location.

std_b1_loc.description: Standard deviation of formant frequency 1 bandwidth.

std_f2_loc.description: Standard deviation of formant frequency 2 location.

std_b2_loc.description: Standard deviation of formant frequency 2 bandwidth.

spectral_gravity.description: Mean spectral gravity, a measure for how high the frequencies in a spectrum are on average over the entire frequency domain weighted by the power spectrum.

spectral_std_dev.description: Mean spectral standard deviation, a measure for how much the frequencies in a spectrum can deviate from the centre of gravity.

spectral_skewness.description: Mean spectral skewness, a measure for how much the shape of the spectrum below the centre of gravity is different from the shape above the mean frequency.

spectral_kurtosis.description: Mean spectral kurtosis, a measure for how much the shape of the spectrum around the centre of gravity is different from a Gaussian shape.

local_jitter.description: Average absolute difference between consecutive periods, divided by the average period.

localabsolute_jitter.description: Average absolute difference between consecutive periods, in seconds.

rap_jitter.description: Relative Average Perturbation, the average absolute difference between a period and the average of it and its two neighbours, divided by the average period.

ppq5_jitter.description: Five-point Period Perturbation Quotient, the average absolute difference between a period and the average of it and its four closest neighbours, divided by the average period.

ddp_jitter.description: Average absolute difference between consecutive differences between consecutive periods, divided by the average period.

local_shimmer.description: Average absolute difference between the amplitudes of consecutive periods, divided by the average amplitude.

localDB_shimmer.description: Average absolute base-10 logarithm of the difference between the amplitudes of consecutive periods, multiplied by 20.

apq3_shimmer.description: Three-point Amplitude Perturbation Quotient, the average absolute difference between the amplitude of a period and the average of the amplitudes of its neighbours, divided by the average amplitude.

apq5_shimmer.description: Five-point Amplitude Perturbation Quotient, the average absolute difference between the amplitude of a period and the average of the amplitudes of it and its four closest neighbours, divided by the average amplitude.

apq11_shimmer.description: The 11-point Amplitude Perturbation Quotient, the average absolute difference between the amplitude of a period and the average of the amplitudes of it and its ten closest neighbours, divided by the average amplitude.

dda_shimmer.description: Average absolute difference between consecutive differences between the amplitudes of consecutive periods.

pesq.description: Wideband Perceptual Estimation of Speech Quality (PESQ).
